content.new:
6.5.1

We have a Gazebo plugin that listens for certain messages, such as joint and camera image messages.  It's also capable of resetting the Gazebo world.

It appears after doing a world reset, we're no longer able to get messages from the camera.
content.old:
6.5.1

We have a Gazebo plugin that listens for certain messages, such as joint and camera image messages.  It's also capable of resetting the Gazebo world.

It appears after doing a world reset, we're no longer able to get messages from the camera.

issue.title: Camera Stops Sending Image Messages After World Reset
